summary: what piss me off about wizarding school is they only have one school in asia like....dude we are the most populated...
body:
what piss me off about wizarding school is they only have one school in asia like….dude we are the most populated continent,one school can’t fit all of us.

and if asian witches and wizards go to mahoutokoro,how the hell we’re going back home?? floo powder? asian houses doesn’t have fireplace, broom? do you know how far is japan??? dissaparate? not allowed.


this is ridiculous.


there must be at least 4 school in southeast asia one in indonesia,one in phillipines, one in vietnam and one in thailand


like imagine how beautiful it will be

blog.name: harrypotterconfessions
blog.title: harry potter confessions.
blog.description:
Harry Potter Confessions collects confessions from fans around tumblr who have something they'd like to say. please read the RULES before clicking below.

we are accepting all confessions at this time

Ask Box is OPEN - - - Submitting is OPEN

summary: I am glad that Harry did have the gall to stand up to Snape as the books went on. I used to have this teacher who belittled me...
caption: I am glad that Harry did have the gall to stand up to Snape as the books went on. I used to have this teacher who belittled me in every lesson and was reduced to tears many times. Reading Harry going for being genuine upset and shocked about his treatment to stand up for himself to the the teacher. I made me feel that I had the right not to be treated like that and stand up and talk back.

reblog.comment: I am glad that Harry did have the gall to stand up to Snape as the books went on. I used to have this teacher who belittled me in every lesson and was reduced to tears many times. Reading Harry going for being genuine upset and shocked about his treatment to stand up for himself to the the teacher. I made me feel that I had the right not to be treated like that and stand up and talk back.

I made me feel that I had the right not to be treated like that and stand up and talk back.

blog.description: This is my second blog which will not be on just ONE fandom. Would answer any asks. It will have posts on maybe reblogs of wolves, jacksepticeye, markiplier and just whatever comes my way ya know? Now then, anyone for a cup of Earl Grey?

summary: Hermione...a Lestrange?!!
body:
Hermione…a Lestrange?!!

Hermione had no words…all this time…her Muggle parents…were foster ones…

All she was told were lies. Lies! That fucking old goat Dumbledor! She fell on her bed, her cat joining her before lying down.

Her real parents…are death eaters.

Her mother….

Bellatrix Lestrange!! But now that you think about it…it does somewhat make sense. She inherit her mom’s bushy curly hair, and since shes part Black, she inherit the intelligence of her grandmother. And Rodolphus’ temper.

She had to find them! But…what if they dont believe her? What if Bella tortures her?

But those are chances she must take.

Grabbing her bag, she found a jar of spare floo powder and rushed to the nearest fireplace. “Malfoy Manor!”

Consumed by green flames, her new journey to find her true family began.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: rosapeachhogwartsmystery
blog.title: RosaPeach and Hogwarts Mystery
blog.description:
A secondary blog where I will post Harry Potter related stuff (like fan art and maybe fictions later on)
 Masterlist: https://rosapeachhogwartsmystery.tumblr.com/post/174464165232/masterlist Series Masterlist: https://rosapeachhogwartsmystery.tumblr.com/post/180217240042/hogwarts-mystery-imagine-series-masterlist

summary: Dating Merula would include...
title: Dating Merula would include...
body:
(Hogwarts Mystery Merula Snyde headcanons)

  • You two arguing a lot (playfully). You two will also be a little competitive, after all, old habits are hard to break.


  • Her getting in fights when someone insults you. No one can insult you except her although she would only do that to you playfully.


  • You hexing people for judging Merula. Just because her parents are Death Eaters, doesn’t mean she would end up the same.


  • Her always calling you her favourite cursed student.


  • Her calling you by your last name whenever she is angry. You would probably do the same to her.


  • Her being affectionate in private. She would definitely hold you close and give you kisses whenever you alone. In public she would just hold your hand, people don’t need to see you two being affectionate.


  • The only time when she acts affectionate in public is when she hears people talking thrash about your relationship. People don’t like you two together means she will kiss you just to annoy them.


  • You flirting with Merula to fluster her and make her yell at you in embarrassment. You love seeing her flustered.


  • Merula would try to flirt with you to make you flustered. You would just point out what she was trying to do with a smirk. Although you could feel yourself getting flustered often.


  • Her slowly becoming friends with your friends. Ben would still be a little nervous around Merula. Tulip and Merula would definitely still argue from time to time.


  • Her being jealous when you get a lot of attention from other people than her and your friends. She doesn’t like sharing you with others.

Masterlist  (To view my Masterlist, visit my Tumblr page)

blog.name: queen-ofsunflowers
blog.title: I am who I am
blog.description: I'm nineteen years old and am a complete nerd. I have my love for my fandoms and I'm not afraid to show it. | Like what you see? Consider buying me a ko-fi maybe?

summary: Thank you for keeping me from being squished. Rowan, now’s not the time for compliments! I am so tiny. This is my actual height...
body:
Thank you for keeping me from being squished.

Rowan, now’s not the time for compliments!

I am so tiny. This is my actual height IRL.

Oh my god!!! LOOK AT THIS!! Any Gryffindors out there, your common room looks amazing. It’s like something out of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

Mission accomplished. It’s time to book it before we get c–

… FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU

Rowan, I get it  But now we are BONED.

I THOUGHT YOU WERE AT THE QUIDDITCH MATCH?! Damn my trickery failling!

Um…. I CAN EXPLAIN. no i can’t, rowan help.

blog.name: cartoonlobster
blog.title: No idea what's going on anymore.

summary:
HP reader insert writer: Oh! I guess the reader will be Harry's twin sister! 
Le me: But almost in every HP reader insert the...
body:
HP reader insert writer: Oh! I guess the reader will be Harry’s twin sister!

Le me: But almost in every HP reader insert the reader is Harry’s sis!

The writer: Shhhh!

Heya! This is an account that automatically posts new James/Lily fanfics!
icon made by @willhsrondale on twitter

summary: Vitriolic
title: Vitriolic
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2sthvxO

by aoifewalshe__314

Growing up as the middle child in a large family with three pairs of twins, Idylla Aesalon was never anything special compared to her siblings. The genetic mutation carried by every Aesalon gives her the most unimpressive Animagi, especially in contrast with her eldest brother’s eagle or her twin’s lynx. However, upon starting Hogwarts, Idylla finds herself being swept into a new life where, for once, she is something special. While her relationship with most of her family deteriorates, her friendships grow stronger.

Words: 3167, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter and the Cursed Child - Thorne & Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Regulus Black, Original Female Character(s), James Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Peter Pettigrew, Voldemort (Harry Potter), Rabastan Lestrange, Bartemius Crouch Jr.
  • Relationships: Regulus Black/Original Female Character(s), James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, Rabastan Lestrange/Original Female Character(s)


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2sthvxO
